title: PM condoles demise of Bilquis Edhi
content:
In a tweet on social media platform Twitter, he said, “The passing of Bilquis Edhi is a huge loss for the nation. An incredible woman in her own right, she stood by Edhi sb. like a rock & together they set up an example of human compassion & ran one of the largest philanthropic organizations of the world. May her soul rest in peace!”
